mapper.insert: insert into entity_attribute (ENTITY_ID, ATTR_ID, ATTR_VALUE) values (#{entityId},#{attributeId},#{attributeValue})
insert into attribute_metadata (ATTR_ID, DISPLAY_NAME, DESCRIPTION, DATATYPE) values (#{attributeId},#{displayName},#{description},#{type})
mapper.select: select ENTITY_ID as entityId, ATTR_ID as attributeId, ATTR_VALUE as attributeValue from entity_attribute where ENTITY_ID = #{entityId} and ATTR_ID = #{attributeId}
select ATTR_ID as attributeId, DISPLAY_NAME as displayName, DESCRIPTION as description, DATATYPE as type from attribute_metadata where ATTR_ID = #{attributeId}
